Text: There is no registration needed so updating is okay!  You can register it if you want to but you don't have to.
Works great... been waiting for this one... thank you... will seed.

Works great.  Registering is no problem. The only problem I had is updating but with a little patience I finally got that done.  Here's the update link:  http://www.familytreemaker.com/Content/Downloads/Patch/2000368-2000376.exe

Brilliant, my PC died, had to reinstall and have lost 11 years of research. Was on Legacy who did not want to know about reinstall, so that was 30 quid up the shute. No one should have any problems downloading this. Thanks Oglecowboy for the patch as well
Brilliant,  No one should have any problems downloading this. Thanks Oglecowboy for the patch as well
This downloaded like a deam. BUT the prog itself is very inflexable, you cannot for example change birth to baptism otherwise its ok, I much prefer Millenium's Legacy 7, a great prog.
Now tried out, very inflexable cannot change say birth to baptism, quite important really if you want to be accurate

Of course you have to pay for Ancestry.com BUT if a couple of you get to gether, one pays then they share the login, I have Tues, Thurs and Fridays and I pay HALF the fees

I keep getting an error message with this - that I don't have access to a certain file.  The last time I tried it was a file with part of the name ..... outdoors/AfricanAmerican ...

Thanks for this upload, appreciated.
Fast download, no malware infection, easy installation.
Also thanks to oglecowboy for update link, worked great.
Program itself is version 2011 (20.0.0.368) that via the provided link can be upgraded to 20.0.0.376.
Nice One. Many Thanks
although no one else has noted this yet, just a heads up - the program did not start for me until i patched it. OS: Windows 7 Enterprise 32 bit.
Thanks!  I have Win7 and the update is required under Admin.  Right click on the program and run as Admin and you will be able to update with no problems.  Thanks again for sharing.
I am not able to register. I am getting Error 404 Server error. I tried the update link from oglecowboy with no success. Any suggestions?
DUH! I had the time zone set wrong. Registration will not work until set correctly. Program works perfectly now, thanks doublenuts.
this is great man! cheers doublenuts!
